sub_fields.label: Section ID
sub_fields.name: section_id
sub_fields.instructions: Must be unique, ie not reused within page

sub_fields.label: Add headline or description above cards?
sub_fields.name: show_intro

sub_fields.label: Add headline or description above image and text rows?
sub_fields.name: show_intro

sub_fields.label: Image left or right?
sub_fields.name: image_side
sub_fields.instructions: Set as "auto" to have image/text alternate sides automatically

sub_fields.label: Add headline or description above media rows?
sub_fields.name: show_intro

sub_fields.label: Section width
sub_fields.name: width
sub_fields.instructions: Full = full-bleed to edges of page; Wide = no padding at edges; Regular = padding at edges; Narrow = restricted width

sub_fields.label: Video Embed Code
sub_fields.name: video_code
sub_fields.instructions: Paste <iframe> embed only - delete any wrapping divs or extra code

sub_fields.label: Video Embed Code
sub_fields.name: video_code
sub_fields.instructions: Paste <iframe> embed only - delete any wrapping divs or extra code

sub_fields.name: width
sub_fields.instructions: Full = full-bleed to edges of page; Wide = no padding at edges; Regular = padding at edges; Narrow = restricted width
